From: Hagop Ghazarian <Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>

Date: 2025-02-20 12:48
Subject: RE: Insured: Clad Trading (Chalhoub) - GIG Policy# 13/FA/33914/0/4 - Rain Damage - 16/04/2024 - Christian Louboutin Level Shoes Dubai Mall - Nasco claim# 66-FIR-2024-05-000216 || 13/FA/2013326
--------------------------------------------------
Hello Hani,

 

The Louboutin team delayed the rectification works until the high demand season ended.
